title: Client is offline and will not log in
body: When I open up my client it has the message "we are unable to log you in because you may be offline". I have tried the fix with deleting the "gameflow-patcher-lock:" line and restarting the client, but I still get the same message popping up. Can someone help me fix this issue and log in?

replies.body: It seems like these login issues might be cleared up at this point, but please let me know if you still can't get logged in. I'm trying to gather some data as to what might have happened, and I'm wondering if this might have been related to an ISP outage of some kind.
I still cannot log in. Also, when i try to repair my client it says "repair failed", I dont know if that helps.
Same issue here. I've even tired deleting the line the in Client code and it does nothing. Reloading the client reinputs the line anyways.
